At 4K, even for apparently similar initial conditions, the G−Z curves may differ considerably between each other. Sometimes the step lengths could be extremelly large compared with the lattice parameter thus leading to spurious peaks in the conductance histograms. Clear peaks close to integer multiples of G0 could only be obtained from selected curves. An averaged histogram over many different initial necks shows no defined peaks at any conductance value.
